Posts.Title: My breasts are leaking!

Posts.Content:
Hi I’m Jenifer, I’m 27 years old. Single mother of a 5-year-old boy. Recently I have exposed that both of my breasts leak... only when squeezed a clear fluid comes out
 But I have no pain in my breast; I do my works on routine ground. I have read lots of articles about
 it, so I know I really don’t have to worry. My doctor said the same obsession... but it affects my ordinary life between me and my husband... always worry, and uncomfortable, 
how to make it stop... I’m not on any birth control
--------------------------------
